alert.note: Alert for Cowley; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:04PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cowley and southeastern Sumner Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1104 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Geuda Springs, or 11 miles west of Arkansas City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Oxford, South Haven, Geuda Springs, Hunnewell, and Strother Field Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
